term.title: Sun Spots
term.hint: Sun spots seen on the Sun are the first indicator of a solar flare (SOHO)

term.title: Solar Flare Eruption
term.hint: Active sunspots may cause a solar flare eruption from the Sun (SOHO)

term.title: Geomagnetic Storms
term.hint: Geomagnetic storms on Earth are caused by energetic particles carried by the Solar Wind (POES)

term.title: Solar Wind
term.hint: A coronal mass ejection sends its cloud of plasma on the Solar Wind (ACE)

term.title: X-Rays
term.hint: Increase x-rays are a result of a solar flare eruption on the Sun (GOES)

messages.correct: Thank you. Your Final Analysis Report has been submitted.
messages.incorrect: The highlighted items are in the wrong place. Review the hints and rearrange the items so they are in the correct location. Then click the button to send your report again.
